nodes.text: Sakiduba, which could be translated as "Third Saki," was a planet located in the Bootana Hutta region of Hutt Space.
Sakiduba was a colony world of the Sakiyan species. It served the unique purpose of being a mining colony for the Sakiyan Collective.

Sakiduba was settled to support Saki's growing repulsorlift industry. The planet provided the bulk of the raw materials necessary to produce repulsorlift engines on Saki. The foundries of Sakiduba formed components that were then shipped to Kæhaxa, the capital city of Saki, for assembly.
